entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing overnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 05 March 2023
